name: Silent World (RedXet)
description:
Silent World is a game made during a week-long workshop by 4 e-artsup students.

In Silent World you wake up in a post apocalyptic colourfull world and you explore it to find out his secrets.

Find and follow the notes that someone left behind him in this whole world in order to learn about it.

The game was made by Axelle Desquilbet, Roman Grzegorzewski, Arnaud Seillier and Hugo Lebre.
